results.title: Zespół serotoninowy
Stille Perturbationen : (Kon)Figurationen der Instabilitäten im Schaffen Judith Hermanns

abstracts.content: Rozprawa doktorska pt. Stille Perturbationen. (Kon)Figurationen der Instabilitäten im Schaffen Judith Hermanns (Ciche perturbacje. Kreacje i konfiguracje niestabilności w twórczości Judith Hermann) poświęcona jest krótkiej prozie współczesnej niemieckiej autorki Judith Hermann (ur. 1970), reprezentującej nurt „Fräuleinwunder“. Teksty Hermann skupiają się na charakterystycznych dla jej pokolenia problemach egzystencjalnych. Na korpus jej pracy składają się cztery tomy opowiadań: Sommerhaus, später (1998), Nichts als Gespenster (2003), Alice (2009) i Lettipark (2016). W pracy wykorzystana jest teoria systemów społecznych niemieckiego socjologa Niklasa Luhmanna, który w centrum swojej refleksji umieszcza eksponowane również w tekstach Hermann zjawisko „komunikacji“. W kategoriach socjologicznych rozważane są zaburzenia komunikacji międzyludzkiej we współczesnym niestabilnym świecie. Szczególna uwaga poświęcona jest kwestii, jak na (kon)figuracje wpływają perturbacje, czyli dodatkowe czynniki zaburzające już i tak niestabilne relacje, takie jak choroba, utrata i inne. Dotychczasowe badania nad współczesną literaturą uwzględniają taką tematykę jedynie marginalnie. Stosowane przez Judith Hermann strategie minimalizmu przyczyniają się do kreowania literackich portretów bohaterów zagubionych we współczesności.

The doctoral dissertation entitled Stille Perturbationen. (Kon)Figurationen der Instabilitäten im Schaffen Judith Hermanns (Silent Perturbations. Creations and configurations of instability in the work of Judith Hermann) is devoted to the short prose of the contemporary German author Judith Hermann (born 1970), representing the “Fräuleinwunder” current. Hermann’s texts focus on existential issues characteristic of her generation. The body of her work consists of four volumes of short stories: Sommerhaus, später (1998), Nichts als Gespenster (2003), Alice (2009) and Lettipark (2016). The work draws on the social systems theory of the German sociologist Niklas Luhmann, who places the phenomenon of “communication”, also highlighted in Hermann’s texts, at the centre of his reflection. In sociological terms, the disruption of human communication in today’s unstable world is taken into account. Particular attention is devoted to the question of how (con)figurations are affected by perturbations, i.e. additional factors that disrupt already unstable relationships, such as illness, loss and so on. To date, research on contemporary literature only marginally considers such topics. Judith Hermann’s use of minimalist strategies contributes to the creation of literary portraits of characters lost in modernity.

book.title: Podmioty pozapaństwowe jako determinanta współczesnych stosunków międzynarodowych

results.title: Rola ONZ w budowaniu podstaw ładu międzynarodowego : żandarm czy platforma do wypracowywania wspólnych rozwiązań?

abstracts.content: Współczesne organizacje międzynarodowe mają już ponad wiekową tradycję, jednak wraz z upływem czasu w naturalny sposób zmieniała się ich konstrukcja oraz zadania i rola, którą odgrywają. Organizacja Narodów Zjednoczonych jest bez wątpienia  strukturą o najszerszym zasięgu geograficznym, a także merytorycznym obszarze działania i stanowi podwalinę światowego ładu i wspólnych wartości. W związku ze wzrostem różnych zagrożeń wynikających między innymi z rozwoju technologicznego, globalizacji, czy też dewastacji ekologicznej, rosną zatem oczekiwania wobec ONZ. Pomimo bardzo dużego wachlarza instytucji  wyspecjalizowanych, jak również zrzeszania niemal wszystkich państw na świecie, Narody Zjednoczone często nie stają się efektywne w swych przedsięwzięciach. Poniższy tekst jest próbą odpowiedzi na pytanie, czy Organizacja Narodów Zjednoczonych powinna pozostać tylko platformą do wspólnego wypracowywania rozwiązań, czy może winna podjąć się roli żandarma światowego pokoju. Jest to krótka synteza oparta na rysie historycznym i poszczególnych  aspektach jej funkcjonowania oraz mająca na celu wskazanie wyzwań stojących przed ONZ i oczekiwań wobec tej struktury.

Modern international organizations have a tradition of more than a century, but with the passage of time, their structure and the tasks and role they play have naturally changed. The United Nations is undoubtedly the structure with the widest geographic scope, as well as substantive area of activity, and is the foundation of global governance and shared values. With the rise of various threats arising from technological development, globalization, or ecological devastation, among others, expectations of the UN are therefore growing. Despite a very large array of specialized institutions, as well as the association of almost every country in the world, the United Nations often fails to become effective in its endeavors. The following text is an attempt to answer the question of whether the United Nations should remain just a platform for working out solutions together, or whether it should take on the role of a gendarme of world peace. It is a brief synthesis based on a historical outline and the various aspects of its functioning, and aimed at indicating the challenges facing the UN and expectations of the structure.

results.title: Badania i Rozwój Młodych Naukowców w Polsce : przegląd badań : część I
Life written in the strata : excavations of the north-eastern sector of the prehistoric hillfort in Maszkowice (Western Carpathians)

abstracts.content: Spośród wielu prehistorycznych osiedli wyżynnych w zachodnich Karpatach stanowisko na Górze Zyndrama w Maszkowicach należy do najbardziej rozpoznawalnych i najlepiej rozpoznanych archeologicznie. Mimo to w 2015 roku, podczas nowego programu badań terenowych, dokonano tutaj zaskakującego odkrycia. Okazało się, że w pierwszej fazie istnienia, datowanej na XVIII stulecie p.n.e., osada została otoczona przez masywne fortyfikacje w postaci muru kamiennego. W kolejnych latach badań odsłonięty został 50-metrowy odcinek tej budowli, która jest najstarszym w Europie - poza basenem Morza Śródziemnego - przykładem kamiennej architektury obronnej. Prezentowane studium to z jednej strony drobiazgowe omówienie wszystkich reliktów odkrytych w północno-wschodnim sektorze stanowiska w latach 2010-2020 - wykop po wykopie, warstwa po warstwie - oraz pozyskanej z nich kolekcji ponad 70 tysięcy artefaktów. To jednak również próba szerszego spojrzenia na społeczne i gospodarcze aspekty funkcjonowania zamieszkujących to miejsce wspólnot, na sposoby organizacji przez nie przestrzeni oraz na współtworzone przez nie sieci kontaktów i wreszcie na procesy, które przekształciły żyjące osiedla w stanowisko archeologiczne. Takie szerokie podejście jest możliwe nie tylko dzięki niezwykłemu bogactwu odkrytych na tym stanowisku źródeł, ale też szczegółowej metodyce prac terenowych (m.in. pełne dokumentowanie lokalizacji wszystkich artefaktów) i interdyscyplinarności badań (współautorzy tomu reprezentują takie dyscypliny i subdyscypliny jak: historia, geografia, pedologia, entomologia, botanika i zoologia). Dla studiów nad kulturowymi relacjami stanowiska na Górze Zyndrama istotne jest to, że dostarczyło ono największej obecnie serii dat radiowęglowych dla powiązanych stratygrafią kontekstów z epoki brązu w całej strefie karpackiej, stając się w ten sposób punktem odniesienia dla badań nad chronologią tego obszaru. W efekcie obok opisu nawarstwień i śladów zabudowy oraz poszczególnych kategorii źródeł w książce znalazły się autonomiczne studia, które mają ponadregionalną perspektywę lub wręcz dotyczą uniwersalnych zjawisk. Są to między innymi rozważania nad funkcją fortyfikacji i ich relacją względem krajobrazu, nowa propozycja chronologii końca wczesnej epoki brązu we wschodniej części Kotliny Karpackiej, ustalenia dotyczące ewolucji sieci kontaktów w Karpatach Zachodnich we wczesnej epoce żelaza oraz zdefiniowanie i charakterystyka jednej z najstarszych w Europie tradycji architektury kamiennej, reprezentowanej przez horyzont datowanych na XVIII i XVII w. p.n.e. "przedcyklopowych" budowli z Bałkanów i południowych Włoch.

Among the many prehistoric hillforts in the Western Carpathians, the site on Zyndram's Hill in Maszkowice is one of the most recognizable and best researched archaeologically. Even so, in 2015, a surprising discovery was made here during a new field research program. It turned out that in the first phase of its existence, dating back to the 18th century BC, the settlement was surrounded by massive fortifications in the form of a dry wall. In the following years of research, a 50-meter section of this building was unveiled, which is one of the oldest in Europe - outside the Mediterranean - examples of stone defensive architecture. The presented study is, on the one hand, a detailed, old-fashioned (in a good sense of the word) discussion of all relics discovered in the north-eastern sector of the site in 2010-2020 - trench by trench, layer by layer - and the collection of over 50,000 artifacts obtained from them. However, it is also an attempt at a broader look at the social and economic aspects of the functioning of the communities inhabiting this place, the ways in which they organize the space and the networks of contacts they co-create, and finally at the processes that transformed subsequent villages into an archaeological site. Such a broad approach is possible not only thanks to the enormous wealth of sources discovered at this site, but also due to the detailed methodology of field work (including full registration of the position of all artifacts) and the interdisciplinary nature of the research (the co-authors of the volume represent such disciplines and sub-disciplines as: history, geography, soil science, entomology, archaeobotany and archaeozoology). What is also significant for the study of the cultural relationships of the site on Zyndram's Hill is that it provided the largest series of AMS radiocarbon dates today for stratigraphically related Early Bronze Age contexts throughout the Carpathian zone as a whole, thus becoming a reference point for research on chronology of the area. As a result, apart from the description of the layers or traces of buildings and individual categories of sources, the book includes autonomous studies that have a supra-regional perspective or even concern universal phenomena. These include among others considerations on the function of fortifications and their relation to the landscape, a new proposal of the chronology of Early/Middle Bronze Age transition in the eastern part of the Carpathian Basin, findings on the evolution of the network of contacts in the Western Carpathians in the Early Iron Age, as well as the definition and characterization of one of the oldest architectural traditions of stone masonry in Europe, represented by a horizon of pre-Cyclopean fortifications from the Balkans and southern Italy dating back to the 18th and 17th centuries BC.

results.title: Od źródeł do widm : wokół nienapisanego poematu Różewicza o kościele Mariackim
Search for pair production of boosted Higgs bosons via vector-boson fusion in the $b\bar{b}b\bar{b}$ final state using pp collisions at $\sqrt{s}$ = 13 TeV with the ATLAS detector

journal.title: Physics Letters, Section B: Nuclear, Elementary Particle and High-Energy Physics

abstracts.content: A search for Higgs boson pair production via vector-boson fusion is performed in the Lorentz-boosted regime, where a Higgs boson candidate is reconstructed as a single large-radius jet, using 140 fb$^{−1}$ of proton–proton collision data at $\sqrt{s}$ = 13 TeV recorded by the ATLAS detector at the Large Hadron Collider. Only Higgs boson decays into bottom quark pairs are considered. The search is particularly sensitive to the quartic coupling between two vector bosons and two Higgs bosons relative to its Standard Model prediction, $\kappa_{2V}$. This study constrains $\kappa_{2V}$ to 0.55 < $\kappa_{2V}$ < 1.49 at the 95% confidence level. The value $\kappa_{2V}$ = 0 is excluded with a significance of 3.8 standard deviations with other Higgs boson couplings fixed to their Standard Model values. A search for new heavy spin-0 resonances that would mediate Higgs boson pair production via vector-boson fusion is carried out in the mass range of 1–5 TeV for the first time under several model and decay-width assumptions. No significant deviation from the Standard Model hypothesis is observed and exclusion limits at the 95% confidence level are derived.

results.title: Poezja i flet : o "Awarii świata" Ewy Lipskiej i Leszka Wiśniowskiego

abstracts.content: Artykuł stanowi analizę i interpretację albumu "Awaria świata" Ewy Lipskiej i Leszka Wiśniowskiego (2021). Płytę tworzy czternaście utworów, których specyfika opiera się na połączeniu autorskiej realizacji głosowej poezji z muzyką skomponowaną i wykonaną przez Leszka Wiśniowskiego. Wiersze, które stały się kanwą kolejnych ścieżek albumu, pochodzą z tomów "Czytnik linii papilarnych" (2015) oraz "Pamięć operacyjna" (2017) krakowskiej poetki. Album układa się w cztery filary dramaturgiczne oddzielone od siebie lejtmotywem wykonywanym na instrumentach dętych drewnianych. Pierwsza część kreśli kosmiczną perspektywę nadchodzącej katastrofy i stanowi pierwszą diagnozę sytuacji. Kolejny segment płyty dotyczy codziennego, ludzkiego doświadczenia rzeczywistości oraz kalekiej - bo tymczasowej - miłości. Kolejna część albumu oscyluje wokół problemów twórczości i autotematyzmu. W końcu ostatni filar dramaturgiczny - najbardziej rozbudowany - poświęcony jest przeczuciom katastroficznym i apokaliptycznym. Najistotniejszym środkiem wyrazu okazuje się być połączenie głosu poetki, pozbawionego emocji i stawiającego światu diagnozę, z wielobarwną, bogatą w różnorodne brzmienia muzyką Wiśniowskiego. Improwizujący flet staje się niejednokrotnie symbolem człowieka - wrzuconego i wprzęgniętego w niszczącą machinę postępu, którą kompozytor oddał za pomocą elektronicznych brzmień i zapętleń.

The article is an analysis and interpretation of the album "Awaria świata" ("World Failure") by Ewa Lipska and Leszek Wiśniowski (2021). The album consists of fourteen pieces, which are based on the combination of the author's vocal performance of poetry with music composed and performed by Leszek Wiśniowski. The poems that became the basis for the tracks of the album come from the volumes "Czytnik linii papilarnych" (2015) and "Pamięć operacyjna" (2017) by the Krakow poetess. The album is arranged in four dramatic parts separated from each other by a leitmotif performed on woodwind instruments. The first part outlines the cosmic perspective of the upcoming catastrophe and is the first diagnosis of the situation. The next segment of the album concerns the everyday human experience of reality and crippled - because temporary - love. The next part of the album revolves around the problems of creativity and self-referentialism. Finally, the last dramatic pillar - the most extensive - is devoted to catastrophic and apocalyptic premonitions. The most important means of expression turns out to be the combination of the poet's voice, devoid of emotions and diagnosing the world, with Wiśniowski’s multicolored music, rich in various sounds. The improvising flute often becomes a symbol of man – thrown and harnessed into the destructive machine of progress, which the composer rendered using electronic sounds and loops.

results.title: Introduction : the rise of China and its challenges to international relations theory

book.title: Differentiation and dominance in Europe's poly-crises

results.title: From division towards convergence? : comparing crises discourses on migration in the Polish parliament

abstracts.content: Migration remains a highly polarising issue in the European Union (EU). The presence of two deeply opposing camps – pro- versus anti-migration – may vary with context. Zooming in on Poland, this contribution investigates how the lines of division are created, evolve, and persist over time, especially in the context of crises. The analysis comprises three crises: the 2015 migration crisis, the 2021 Polish/EU border crisis with Belarus, and Russia’s war on Ukraine in 2022, and its subsequent movement of people. All three crises have been extensively debated in Poland, albeit with many nuances. Through a qualitative content analysis of the debates on these crises in the Polish parliament, this research analyses the discursive evolution of the lines of division over asylum and migration policy. It also considers the issue of dominance in relation to the EU, as well as within the domestic arena. The results demonstrate that the discursive lines of division continued, deepened, and expanded from the 2015 crisis to the 2021 border crisis, with conflicting framing of migration and increased perceived governmental dominance at national level by the parties in opposition. The war in Ukraine, which began in 2022, however, seems to bring a new dimension to the debate, focused on the assistance to refugees. In spite of some contentious points triggering some national confrontation in the parliament, the latter crisis introduced a less disputed, more positive, and united discourse on migration in the Polish parliament.

results.title: Barszcz ukraiński

abstracts.content: W artykule podjęto próbę pokazania, jak w języku ukraińskim funkcjonuje forma борщ,  oraz ukazanie przez pryzmat języka, jak szczególne znaczenie ma ta potrawa w kulturze ukraińskiej. W tym celu wykorzystano materiał zaczerpnięty ze słowników i korpusów językowych oraz przedstawiono potencjał słowotwórczy i frazeotwórczy nazwy борщ. Materiał ukraiński porównano z polskim i rosyjskim. Stwierdzono, że prawdopodobnie potrawę z buraków nazywano борщем na Ukrainie już w 1 poł. XVII w., więc znaczenie to najprawdopodobniej pojawiło się na gruncie ukraińskim. Przeanalizowane dane zdają się również świadczyć, że w języku rosyjskim nazwa борщ jako określenie zupy na bazie buraków rozprzestrzeniła się pod wpływem języka ukraińskiego, a popularność zyskała dopiero w czasach ZSRR.

The article attempts to show the functioning of the form of борщ in Ukrainian and the special meaning of this dish in Ukrainian culture through the prism of language. For this purpose, material taken from dictionaries and linguistic corpora was used, and the word formation and phrase-forming potential of the борщ form was presented. Ukrainian material was compared with both Polish and Russian. It was found that the beetroot dish was probably called борщ in Ukraine as early as in the first half of the 17th century, so this meaning most likely originated on Ukrainian soil. The analyzed data also seem to prove that in Russian the name борщ as a term for beetroot soup has spread under the influence of the Ukrainian language, and gained it's popularity not until the times of the USSR.

book.title: Universities and non-governmental organisations : a comparative European study of the potential for civil society collaboration

results.title: University as a collaborator : universities, society and culture

abstracts.content: This chapter discusses how Polish universities have changed the understanding of their role in the creation and dissemination of culture, as well as in the preservation of cultural heritage. The political transformation of 1989, which brought back democratic regime to Poland, was a turning point in Polish higher education system, and the government has started to understand its importance in securing economic growth and social stability. During the last decade of the 20th century and early 21st century, the government has introduced the market-centered approach to Polish higher education policy, partially following recommendations of the World Bank and OECD. However, the very recent changes show that universities should appreciate their social role that goes far beyond just economic impact. Therefore, Polish universities have once again adopted culture and cultural heritage as one of their key responsibilities.

results.title: Digitization of cultural heritage as a form of its protection

abstracts.content:
Digitization is a complicated process that requires appropriate knowledge and skills. This is an expensive and time-consuming activity. However, it is an invaluable method of archiving, disseminating, and protecting cultural heritage. In digital era, the significance of digitizing cultural heritage cannot be overstated.
By bringing cultural treasures into the digital realm, we extend their lifespan; enhance their accessibility, and open doors to exploration, study, and appreciation that were once unimaginable.
The research selectively describes the types and process of digitization. A range of applications of digitization technologies for cultural heritage has been proposed. Selected programs of the European Union (EU) and the Polish Ministry

book.title: Poland and South Asia: Deepening Engagement

results.title: Between arms sales and democracy promotion : Poland-Myanmar relations

abstracts.content: Examines the vicissitudes of Polish-Burmese relations since the establishment of diplomatic relations. The lack of any noticeable improvement in bilateral relations during the 1990s and the 2000s was followed by some improvement in the 2010s when Poland supported political changes and extended development assistance for democracy promotion. Bilateral relations subsequently declined because of the Law and Justice (PiS) government’s disinterest in democracy promotion, the Rohingya crisis, the impact of the Covid pandemic, and the 2021 coup in Myanmar.

results.title: Bronisław Malinowski and his legacy in contemporary social sciences and humanities : on the centenary of Argonauts of the Western Pacific

abstracts.content: As one of the most renowned figures in the history of anthropology, Bronisław Malinowski is recognised as having been central to the development of the discipline, with interpretations of his thought usually drawing attention to his work in founding the approach of functionalism and his innovative method of intensive field research. This book offers a decisive extension of Malinowski’s achievement, referring to the accomplishments of present‑day social sciences and humanities and the debts that they owe to Malinowksi’s oeuvre. Bringing together eminent scholars in such fields as social anthropology, sociology, law, cultural studies, literary and theatre studies, and art history, this book emphasises the importance of Malinowski’s theoretical and methodological insights as a treasure trove of inspiration for contemporary researchers. A critical commentary on the life, work, and legacy of Bronisław Malinowski, it sheds light on his academic work, while personal documents, many of which are not well known - or are completely unknown - in the Anglophone sphere, prove their fundamental importance for understanding his oeuvre, and the intellectual connections between his work and the work of other most prominent intellectuals of the 20th and 21st centuries. It will therefore appeal to scholars across the social sciences and humanities with interests in the history of anthropology and sociology and fundamental questions of theory and research methodology.

results.title: Niebezpieczne umysły : czy otwarta nauka może szkodzić?

abstracts.content: Artykuł prezentuje innowacyjne podejście w badaniach nad szkolnictwem wyższym i polityką naukową. Rozpowszechniona narracja traktuje otwartość nauki i dostęp do edukacji wyższej jako dobro wspólne, do którego należy zapewnić jak najszerszy dostęp. Jednak doświadczenia amerykańskie pokazują wyraźnie, że otwieranie dostępu do rezultatów badań i edukacji wyższej może stanowić zagrożenie dla bezpieczeństwa narodowego. Obok łatwego do zrozumienia niebezpieczeństwa w postaci wykorzystania odkryć naukowych dla celów militarnych przez wrogie reżimy, niepokojącym zjawiskiem jest także na przykład uzależnienie od zagranicznych absolwentów w zakresie pokojowego wykorzystania energii nuklearnej. I tak doświadczenie USA może stanowić ważny argument dla przemyślenia polskiego podejścia do otwartości naukowej.

The article presents an innovative approach in research on higher education and science policy. The prevailing narrative treats openness in science and access to higher education as a common good that should be provided with the widest possible access. However, American experiences clearly show that widening open access to research results and higher education can pose a threat to national security. Alongside the easily understandable danger of using scientific discoveries for military purposes by hostile regimes, another concerning phenomenon is, for example, dependence on foreign graduates in the peaceful use of nuclear energy. Thus, the US experience can be an important argument for reconsidering Poland's approach to scientific openness.

book.title: Poland and South Asia: Deepening Engagement

results.title: Poland and South Asia : perceptions and discourses

book.title: Between language and literature : Hindi in classroom and beyond

results.title: Introducing B.A. students to Hindi literary tradition through problem based learning (PBL)

abstracts.content: PBL is known among its practitioners as a didactic method that greatly boosts students’ efficiency in learning to learn. It allows for a shift of the center of gravity from knowledge content to skills. Despite its long university career, it is not as widely widespread in human studies as, e.g. in social sciences or in medical studies for which it had been created. The present paper provides an outline of PBL for the purpose of its wider implementation in teaching literary studies. The paper presents a case study of a course in Hindi literary tradition along with a proposition of an introductory class for B.A. students to illustrate a new way of implementing the PBL method with due attention paid to a literary text as a problem case. Eventually, the paper seeks to demonstrate that even a short problem case enables the acquisition of a considerable amount of knowledge content.

book.title: Język i gramatyka w kulturze między Wschodem a Zachodem

results.title: Wymowa polska według "A Polish phonetic reader" Mariana Z. Arenda z 1924 roku

abstracts.content: Polish pronunciation according to Marian Z. Arend’s A Polish Phonetic Reader (1924) Marian Z. Arendt’s A Polish Phonetic Reader is a somewhat forgotten early 20th-century work on Polish pronunciation aimed at foreign learners of Polish. The Poznań-based author, who studied phonetics under Daniel Jones, gives a brief description of the phonological system of Polish, and a collection of twelve short passages transcribed in the International Phonetic Alphabet meant for pronunciation practice, accompanied by a vocabulary. The article examines the reader with a view to determining its accuracy at representing the standard accent of Polish of Arend’s time, while taking into consideration selected aspects of allophonic, spatial and temporal variation. The analysis leads to the conclusion that while the author failed to acknowledge certain local Greater Polish traits in the speech variety he described and despite a few other minor flaws, his book offered its target audience a relatively comprehensive and reliable phonetic analysis of one of the variants of standard Polish.

book.title: Dioskurowie : zgoda - przyjaźń - braterstwo

results.title: Afekt w humanistycznej sztuce przyjaźni : Michel de Montaigne

abstracts.content: Montaigne’s essay On Friendship (De l’amitié) belongs to the humanist art of friendship (ars amicitiae) combining more or less philosophically elaborated concepts or ideas about developing and nurturing this interpersonal relation. These ideas are mainly derived from ancient authors (Aristotle, Cicero, Seneca). First of all, Montaigne’s essay is an interesting study of friendly affect, entangled in various types of rhetorical strategies involved in expressing and arousing feelings and emotions. In this commemorative narrative on his deceased friend, Étienne de la Boétie (1530-1563), he depicted the perfect friendship as an inexplicable phenomenon of agreement of will covering all desires and aspirations of both friends. In these terms, friendship is "a noble union" mixed with "voluntary servitude". Our friend turns out to be a living image (imago) of ourselves in which can see reflection of our thoughts, feelings, and desires.

results.title: Parental control and internet use among Italian adolescents

abstracts.content: Internet use can have both positive and negative impacts. Above all, risks are linked to immoderate use among adolescents. The importance of parental control over their children’s internet use is a key element in limiting the risk factors that such use may have. We investigated this perception by administering a self-report questionnaire to 236 Italian teenagers aged 14-17 years, of which 69.9% are female. Descriptive analyses were primarily conducted. Subsequently, to identify any differences in responses provided concerning social variables, Covariance Analyses and Multivariate Covariance Analyses (one in relation to each batch of items), whose factors were "residency area" (small centre - large centre), "socio-economic status" (medium high-medium low), and “gender”, were conducted. The variable "age" was inserted as a covariate. In line with the literature, the findings confirm that parental control plays a decisive role in favouring the responsible use of the Internet. Furthermore, we found that the place of residence influences the length of time spent on the Internet. Nevertheless, we observed that the relationship between parental control and the use/abuse of the Internet does not change depending on the parents’ economic status.

results.title: Jak prawować się z Bogiem? : doświadczenie Hioba jako wyzwanie filozoficzne

abstracts.content: W artykule podjęta została problematyka doświadczenia religijnego i jego znaczenia dla myśli filozoficznej. W głównej zaś mierze przywołane zostały te wątki teoretyczne i perspektywy interpretacyjne, które wprost odnoszą się do filozoficznych (humanistycznych) interpretacji biblijnej Księgi Hioba. Pojawienie się postaci Hioba, rozważanej w kręgu szeroko rozumianej myśli filozoficznej (humanistycznej), dało bowiem asumpt do rozwinięcia istotnych zagadnień dotyczących form obecności sacrum w świecie specyficznie ludzkim. Odnosząc się do wybranych interpretacji biblijnej postaci (I. Kant, J. Danielou, R. Girard, C. G. Jung, S. Kierkegaard, L. Szestow) proponowane rozważania wskazują na nieprzemijającą doniosłość "doświadczenia Hioba" i jego wagę dla głębszego i szerszego rozumienia specyfiki doświadczenia religijnego jako filozoficznie zinterpretowanego wymiaru doświadczenia ludzkiego.

The article discusses issues related to religious experience and its importance in philosophical considerations. It primarily refers to those theoretical concepts and interpretative perspectives which are directly related to philosophical (humanistic) interpretations of the Biblical Book of Job. The emergence of the figure of Job pondered  from the viewpoint of various philosophical (humanistic) approaches, provided a stimulus for the development of important concepts related to the presence of the sacred element in the specifically human world. Making reference to the selected interpretations of this Biblical figure (I. Kant, J. Danielou, R. Girard, C. G. Jung, S. Kierkegaard, L. Shestov), the  reflections presented here emphasise the enduring relevance of "Job's experience" and its importance for deeper and more extensive understanding of the specificity of religious experience as a dimension of human experience explained in philosophical terms.

results.title: "Kazan" w tradycji, kulturze i języku tureckim

abstracts.content: Desygnatami tureckiego rzeczownika "kazan" są: 1. duży, głęboki, metalowy garnek wykorzystywany do przygotowywania żywności, 2. urządzenie techniczne, w którym woda jest podgrzewana w celu uzyskania pary. W obu przypadkach cechą wyróżniającą kazan jest jego rozmiar, który umożliwia przygotowywanie żywności lub gotowanie wody w dużych ilościach. "Kazan" historycznie odgrywał i nadal odgrywa ważną rolę w tureckiej kulturze i tradycji. O jego znaczeniu świadczą również fakty językowe, w tym przysłowia, powiedzenia, wyrażenia idiomatyczne itp.

The designata of the Turkish noun "kazan" are: 1. a large, deep, metal pot used in households for cooking food, 2. a technical device in which water is heated for the purpose of obtaining steam in steam-powered appliances or heating systems. In both cases, the distinguishing characteristic of kazan is its size, which enables the preparation of food or boiling water in large volumes.
Kazan historically played and continues to play an important role in Turkish culture and tradition. Its significance is also evidenced by linguistics facts, including proverbs, sayings, idiomatic expressions, etc.

book.title: Politics and the media in Poland from the 19th to the 21st centuries : selected issues

results.title: Mass media under censorial surveillance : politics in press in the Polish People's Republic of the 1960s and 70s

abstracts.content: The main purpose of the paper is to analyse the operation of communist censorship in the 1960s and 70s in the Polish People's Republic, including its impact on the national press of the period. The author takes a keen interest in the complex relationships between censors and editors-in-chief, with particular focus on the compromises the latter had to accept to escape bans of single issues or even whole newspapers, by following recommendations imposed by individual censors and the Main Office for the Control of the Press, Publications, and Public Performance. The study of the role of censors in communist Poland has been conducted against a broader context of deliberations on the Platonian genesis behind the idea of censorship and the temptation to use it as a tool for social engineering in modern democracies.

results.title: Curvature in the very-high energy gamma-ray spectrum of M 87

abstracts.content: The radio galaxy M 87 is a variable very-high energy (VHE) gamma-ray source, exhibiting three major flares, which were reported in 2005, 2008, and 2010. Despite extensive studies, the origin of the VHE gamma-ray emission is not yet fully understood. In this study, we investigate the VHE gamma-ray spectrum of M 87 during states of high gamma-ray activity, utilizing 20.2 h of H.E.S.S. observations. Our findings indicate a preference for a curved spectrum, characterized by a log-parabola model with extra-galactic background light (EBL) model above 0.3 TeV at the 4σ level, compared to a power-law spectrum with EBL. We investigate the degeneracy between the absorption feature and the EBL normalization and derive upper limits on EBL models that are mainly sensitive in the wavelength range of 12.4 μm–40 μm.

results.title: Reading rate in Polish : the research on Polish native speakers and foreigners learning Polish

abstracts.content: This paper discusses the topic of reading rate, reading comprehension, and overall reading fluency in Polish. The study aims to address several key questions, including: What are the typical reading rate and expected level of comprehension among Polish high school graduates? How about Polish eighth-year primary school students? Are there any discernible differences between these two groups, and if so, what are they?What reading rates and levels of reading comprehension can be expected from foreigners learning Polish?How does their competence change across different levels of language proficiency? Following an examination of more than two hundred participants in each of these three groups, the study found that the average reading rate achieved by high school graduates was approximately 176 Average Polish Words per minute, accompanied by a corresponding 66% score on the comprehension test. interestingly, primary school students appeared to achieve a similar level of comprehension, but their reading rate was slightly lower at 156 APWpm. Both of these results suggest that students in Poland should be encouraged to read more slowly and attentively. Concerning foreigners learning Polish, their reading rate increased from 87 APWpm at level B1 to 117 APWpm at level C2, while maintaining a high level of comprehension. While the latter was nearly equal to that of Polish students, foreigners exhibited differences in their level of self-confidence. It is therefore advisable to pay attention to this aspect and encourage greater self-assurance in their linguistic skills. It should be noted that this paper represents only a segment of a larger doctoral project. Further results may become available in subsequent articles and in the completed dissertation.

book.title: Interreligious encounters in Europe : sites, materialities and practices

results.title: The materiality and aesthetics of the City in Dialogue : the case of the Day of Islam in the Catholic Church in Poland

abstracts.content: In this chapter, we discuss conditions framing the interfaith dialogue in Poland as they appear in their materialized, localized and discursive dimensions. Drawing on Waldenfels (2011), we perceive the interreligious dialogue as an in-between place: a liminal landscape that simultaneously connects and separates. The main focus of our analysis is the socially and culturally situated dialogue between the Catholic Church - Poland’s dominant religious institution - and Islam striving for inclusion and visibility in the local settings. The case study we present is the celebration of the Day of Islam in the Catholic Church in the city of Krakow. In particular, we concentrate on the public controversy surrounding the poster that advertised the event in 2020. The poster depicts one of the important landmarks of the city - the symbol-laden Saint Mary’s Basilica in the Main Market Square surrounded by imagined architectural objects that emblematize Muslim presence (mosques and minarets). In the analysis of these references to space and material presence of religion in Krakow’s landscape, we juxtapose the symbolic content of the poster with the discursive practices employed to trap Muslims into a realm of the alien and reflect on the existing dialogue agenda affected by the current rise of the right-wing populism.

book.title: Język i gramatyka w kulturze między Wschodem a Zachodem

results.title: Refleksja nad semantyką leksemu "azma" (‘kryzys’) we frazemach rzeczownikowych we współczesnym arabskim dyskursie medialnym

abstracts.content:
Celem badań jest próba rewizji znaczenia arabskiego leksemu "azma" – ‘kryzys', sytuacja krytyczna w aktualnym dyskursie medialnym oraz skonfrontowanie tego pojęcia z zachodnimi teoriami badań nad kryzysem. Punktem zainteresowania jest semantyka badanego leksemu jako komponentu frazemów.
Badania przeprowadzone zostały poprzez analizę kontekstu frazeologicznego. Analizie poddanych zostało 50 frazemów rzeczownikowych wyekscerpowanych z tytułów informacji medialnych na portalu aljazeera.net pozyskanych za pomocą opcji wyszukiwarki według kolejności pozycjonowania.
Celem ustalenia aktualnego zakresu znaczenia leksemu w badaniach wykorzystano podejście semazjologiczne (od terminu do pojęcia), przyporządkowując znaczenia leksemu do szerszych definicji sformułowanych na podstawie internetowego słownika znaczeń "Almaany". 
Zidentyfikowane znaczenia skonfrontowane zostały z kluczowymi teoriami zachodnich badań nad kryzysem, co uwidacznia fakt nierozerwalności interferencji języka z dziedziczeniem systemu pojęciowego. Prowadzi to do krótkiej polemiki z twierdzeniem, że zapożyczenia terminologiczne z języków obcych nie stanowią integralnej części systemu języka arabskiego.

The aim of this research is to attempt to revise the meaning of the Arabic lexeme "azma" – ‘crisis’, critical situation' in current media discourse and to confront this concept with Western theories of crisis research. The point of interest is the semantics of the studied lexeme as a component of phrazemes. The research was conducted by analysing the phraseological context. Fifty noun phrazemes extracted from the titles of media information on aljazeera.net extracted using the search engine option according to position order were analysed. In order to establish the current scope of the lexeme’s meaning, the study used a semascientific approach (from term to concept), assigning the lexeme’s meanings to broader definitions formulated on the basis of Almaany’s online dictionary of meanings. The identified meanings were confronted with key theories of Western crisis research, highlighting the fact that language interference is inseparable from the inheritance of the conceptual system. This leads to a brief polemic against the claim that terminological borrowings from foreign languages are not an integral part of the Arabic language system.

book.title: Theory and practice of Polish language teaching : new methodological concepts

results.title: The development of academic reflection on learning and teaching Polish as a foreign language : theoretical and methodological concepts

abstracts.content: The turn of the 21st century is viewed as a period of consolidation of foreign language education studies as a scholarly discipline. One of its subdisciplines is Polish as a foreign language, an increasingly independent academic discipline that today constitutes a multifaceted field of research focused on the acquisition and learning/teaching of Polish, as well as the promotion of Polish culture in Poland and abroad. The current article outlines the development of scholarly thought with regard to teaching Polish as a non-first language and presents directions for the advancement of the methodological aspects of research into Polish language education. Against this backdrop, we examine study reports, primarily authored by young scholars, and provide an overview of the chapters included in this volume.

keywords: icons of the Passion of Christ

book.title: Orthodox liturgy and anti-Judaism

results.title: Representations of the Sanhedrin in post-Byzantine art following the example of a 19th century icon in Uličskié Krivé

abstracts.content: In Slovakia, two nineteenth-century icons of the Passion of Christ are found at Archangel Michael Orthodox Church in the village of Uličskié Krivé and Humenne museum in the village of Nová Sedlica. They present scenes of The Unjust Trial of Christ. Christ is tried by Pilate, Caiaphas and members of the Sanhedrin. In the hall, there are several judges holding scrolls with the texts of the death sentence. This iconographic theme is not known in Byzantine art and comes from the West. This paper will show the original details of this presentation and discuss its reception in post-Byzantine art in Central and Eastern Europe.

book.title: Oriens exterior et extremus : z badań krakowskich orientalistów

results.title: Forma "-ss(h)-" i jej zastosowanie we współczesnej japońszczyźnie w opiniach młodych użytkowników języka

abstracts.content:
The present article focuses on discussing the "-ss(h)-" form (Jap. っす) as a component of Japanese youth sociolect, and simultaneously as a comparatively innovative communicative tool which is presented here as an “intermediate form” between plain (casual) forms and addressative forms. The additional aim is to suggest the potential position of this form in the schema of vertical and horizontal honorific oppositions. On the grounds of the survey research which was conducted from November 2022 to February 2023 among the students of eight selected Japanese universities, the major users and receivers of the "-ss(h)-" form and their attitude towards it are presented. The impact of such extralinguistic factors as: age, status, gender, relations between language users, as well as communicative space (private or public) on the selection of the "-ss(h)-" form as a language register are also taken into consideration. The analysis is
supplemented with the evaluation of the correctness and appropriateness level of the "-ss(h)-" use, as contrasted with the use of standard addressative forms ("de-s(h)-" / "-mas(h)-"). A brief reflection on whether the use of "-ss(h)-" should be regarded as a display of such pragmatic changes as democratization and simplification of honorifics, or contrary, as young speakers’ communicative manifestation of traditional verticality based on the senior : junior (senpai : kōhai)
opposition, is also included.

results.title: Teorie biologiczne a przestępczość kobiet

book.title: Słowiańska frazeologia gwarowa III

results.title: Semantic correlation and disambiguation of "Perun" in West and East Slavic languages and phraseology

abstracts.content: The aim of this paper is to investigate the stages of development of lexical item "Perun" (the late Proto-Slavic Thunder god) in Western and Eastern Slavic languages, dialects and phraseological units. This will be done considering how during a specific time, the theonym and the thunderstorm phenomenon associated with him have been inseparable and thus semantically correlated. Subsequently changes in the theonym, and in the use of the theonym, provoked changes in the common noun, resulting in semantic disambiguation. Often these changes brought a contrastive stance towards the theonym ("Perun" as a swear word or as an evil entity) but they also retained some positive meanings typical of previous cultural phases ("Perun" as a hero or a strong person). Western and Eastern Slavic languages and dialects show different pattern of semantic disambiguation and correlation, as the total disambiguation of Russian and Czech or the total correlation in Belarusian and Polish. The dialects and the phraseological material sums in general the contrastive attitude and the positive meaning of Perun, maintaining in some cases a certain degree of ambiguity.

book.title: Studia classica linguistica et litteraria I

results.title: Spotkanie Agesilaosa z Farnabazosem, czyli o niełatwej przyjaźni : kilka uwag na marginesie sceny z "Historii greckiej" (4.1) Ksenofonta

abstracts.content: Among all the Greek authors referring about Persia in the 5th and 4th century BC, whose works were preserved to the modern time, Xenophon deserves special attention: years spent in the Achaemenid empire allowed him to know the country and its people. Thanks to the personal experience Xenophon’s perspective was not limited by the stereotypic image of the “barbarians” prevailing in the Greek public discourse and he was able to offer more complex and subtle image of the Greco-Persian relations. The aim of this paper is the analysis of the passage from the "Hellenica" 4.1 describing the meeting of Agesilaus, king of Sparta, and Pharnabazus, the satrap of Phrygia ("Hell." 4.1), since the account of this event provides an excellent example of intercultural exchange and demonstrates Xenophon’s balanced approach to the issue.

book.title: Handbook on cyber hate: the modern cyber evil

results.title: Rethinking hate speech and cyberhate concepts : the case of smear campaigns against judges in Poland

abstracts.content: The press and whistleblowers have reported that in Poland, not long ago (around 2018–2019), there was a special “taskforce”, headed by a senior officer in the Ministry of Justice, that was formed solely to spread defamatory comments about judges who disapproved of the new judicial reforms. Although certain legal proceedings (including cases initiated by the targeted judges themselves) are still pending, this set of circumstances nevertheless presents an excellent starting point for exploration of activities initiated and conducted by public officials in order to discredit a particular occupational group. This article aims at (a) providing a glimpse into the literature on hate speech and cyberhate, (b) outlining the general context of the conducted attacks, (c) identifying key features of the derogatory narrative presented in the @KastaWatch Twitter (now X) account and on the rightwing wPolityce.pl portal, (d) examining whether the speech acts comprising this narrative fit the schemes associated with the hate speech and cyberhate concepts, and (e) postulating lessons about democracies that can be derived from this particular case.

results.title: The analysis of the relevance of the 2030 Agenda Goals for the Development of a Model for Assessing Sustainable Development

abstracts.content: W ramach globalnych wysiłków na rzecz osiągnięcia zrównoważonego rozwoju, Agenda 2030 i jej cele zrównoważonego rozwoju (SDGs) zostały przyjęte jako kompleksowe ramy w celu stawienie czoła kluczowym globalnym wyzwaniom, w tym ubóstwu, nierównościom społecznym, zmianom klimatycznym. Skuteczne monitorowanie i ocena postępów w realizacji tych celów wymaga rzetelnych i mierzalnych wskaźników, które mogą dostarczyć konkretnych informacji na temat postępów w różnych obszarach. Celem badań jest identyfikacja i analiza kluczowych wskaźników służących pomiarowi postępu w realizacji celów zrównoważonego rozwoju Agendy 2030. Niniejsze badanie koncentruje się na wyborze wskaźników, które dostarczają obiektywnych i mierzalnych informacji na temat postępów w realizacji każdego celu, odzwierciedlając jednocześnie szerszy cel kontekst społeczno-ekonomiczny i środowiskowy. W badaniu zastosowano kombinację metod ilościowych i jakościowych w celu selekcji i oceny wskaźników. Analiza ilościowa polega na statystycznej ocenie dostępności i spójności danych, natomiast analiza jakościowa koncentruje się na ocenie trafności i dokładności wskaźników w odniesieniu do celów zrównoważonego rozwoju. Dane zebrano z różnych publicznie dostępnych źródeł, w tym międzynarodowych baz danych, takich jak baza danych Organizacji Narodów Zjednoczonych i Banku Światowego. W następstwie badań zidentyfikowano kluczowe wyzwania wynikające z niespójnych i niekompletnych danych. Wskazano na znaczenie innowacji technologicznych w gromadzeniu danych. W badaniu podkreślono także potrzebę kompleksowego podejścia do wskaźników pozwalających na uchwycenie kontekstu społeczno-gospodarczego i środowiskowego. Oprócz wkładu w rozwój badań zogniskowanych na skuteczności zarządzania, badania dostarczają cennych informacji dla decydentów w zakresie wspierania globalnych wysiłków na rzecz osiągnięcia bardziej zrównoważonego i sprawiedliwego otoczenia.

Research background: As part of global efforts to achieve sustainable development, the 2030 Agenda and its Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) have been adopted as a comprehensive framework for addressing critical global challenges, including poverty, inequality, climate change and environmental protection. Effective monitoring and evaluation of progress on these goals requires reliable and measurable indicators that provide concrete information on progress in different areas. Purpose of the article: This paper aims to identify and analyse key indicators for measuring progress towards the 2030 Agenda SDGs. This study focuses on selecting indicators that can provide objective and measurable information on progress towards each goal while reflecting the broader socio-economic and environmental contexts. Methods: The study uses quantitative and qualitative methods to select and evaluate indicators. The quantitative analysis involves a statistical assessment of data availability and consistency, while the qualitative research focuses on assessing the relevance and accuracy of indicators to the SDGs. Data were collected from various publicly available sources, including international databases such as the United Nations and the World Bank. Findings & Value added: The study results show the importance of the selected indicators as an effective tool for monitoring and evaluating progress towards the SDGs. Key challenges were identified, including inconsistent and incomplete data and the importance of technological innovation for more accurate data collection. The study also highlights the need for a comprehensive approach to interpreting indicators that includes understanding the broader socio-economic and environmental contexts. The results provide valuable information for policymakers, research institutions, and other stakeholders, and they support global efforts to achieve a more sustainable and equitable world for all.

results.title: Pojęcie neutralności klimatycznej w orzecznictwie sądów administracyjnych

abstracts.content: Osiągnięcie porozumienia podczas obrad Rady Europy 12.12.2019 r. ma  uczynić Unię Europejską do 2050 r. neutralną klimatycznie. Jest jeszcze zbyt wcześnie, aby pojawiły się orzeczenia sądowe oparte wyłączenie na przepisach regulujących neutralność klimatyczną. Stąd występuje ona w uzasadnieniach wyroków raczej jako cel, który należy osiągnąć lub jako odniesienie dla interpretacji innych pojęć, ewentualnie można z nią utożsamiać inne określenia składające się na pojęcie neutralności klimatycznej, na przykład „zrównoważony rozwój”, „redukcja emisji gazów cieplarnianych” lub „zielona energia”.

abstracts.content: The article describes the history and cultural heritage of the French overseas community of Saint-Pierre and Miquelon, where the strongest cultural elements were brought by the settlers from the Basque Country, Brittany and Normandy. The study discusses their surnames, language, and events with activities celebrating their ancestral heritage.

results.title: Political system of the Polish-Lithuanian commonwealth and its legal bases : research dilemmas

abstracts.content:
Okres istnienia Rzeczypospolitej Obojga Narodów to niezwykle interesujące zagadnienie dla badaczy dziejów dawnego państwa polskiego.  Mogłoby się wydawać, że został on już dogłębnie zbadany. Jednak próba innego spojrzenia na kwestie ustrojowe powoduje potrzebę reinterpretacji źródeł. Wśród zagadnień wymagających ponownego naukowego namysłu można wskazać problem zasad elekcji władcy. Dotychczas była ona rozumiana na sposób współczesny. Oto szlachta zagwarantowała sobie, że po śmierci władcy, zjeżdża się na pole elekcyjne i wybiera jednego spośród zgłoszonych kandydatów. Czy tak rzeczywiście było, skoro elekcyjność tronu zagwarantował król w Artykułach henrykowskich wraz ze swoimi następcami królami polskimi, których należy kwalifikować jako jego potomków. A zatem szlachta miała wybierać spośród synów zmarłego monarchy. Dbałość o interes dynastii za panowania Zygmunta III Wazy skutkowała potrzebą doprecyzowania tego przepisu z punktu widzenia szlacheckich wyborców.
Kolejnym interesującym problemem było funkcjonowania najwyższego organu Rzeczypospolitej – sejmu walnego. Szczególną uwagę należy zwrócić na zagadnienia, które uważa się za przyczynę degrengolady tego organu ustawodawczego. Chodzi o instytucję liberum veto. Ten temat też się wydaje już zamknięty. Tymczasem jak funkcjonował ten mechanizm i czy rzeczywiście prawo posła do protestu rozumianego jako przejaw wolności słowa doprowadziło do fatalnych skutków dla polskiego parlamentaryzmu? Może do upadku doprowadziło przyzwolenie na opuszczanie miejsca obrad, choć sprzeciwiało się ono koncepcji deliberacji.
Te i inne problemy wymagają ponownej analizy w oparciu o bogate źródła archiwalne z tej epoki.

The period of existence of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth is an extremely interesting issue for researchers of the history of the former Polish state. It would seem that it has already been thoroughly researched. However, an attempt to look at political issues differently results in the need to reinterpret archival sources. Among the issues that require renewed scientific consideration is the problem of the rules for electing the king. So far, it has been understood in a modern way. Here, the nobility guaranteed that after the ruler's death, they would go to the electoral field and choose one of the proposed candidates. Was this really the case, since the electability of the throne was guaranteed by the king in the Henrician Articles 1573 together with his successors, Polish kings, who should be qualified as his descendants. Therefore, the nobility had to choose from among the sons of the deceased monarch. Attention to the interests of the dynasty during the reign of Sigismund III Vasa resulted in the need to clarify this provision from the point of view of noble voters.
Another interesting problem was the functioning of the highest organ of the Republic of Poland - the General Sejm. Particular attention should be paid to issues that are believed to be the cause of the decline of this legislative body. This is about the institution of liberum veto. This topic also seems to be closed. Meanwhile, how did this mechanism function and did the MP's right to protest, understood as a manifestation of freedom of speech, actually lead to disastrous consequences for Polish parliamentarism? Perhaps what led to the downfall was the permission to leave the meeting place, even though it was contrary to the concept of deliberation.
These and other problems require re-analysis based on rich archival sources from this era.
